name: Casting Treatment Rejection Analysis
query:
SELECT
    ctrrd.casting_treatment_rejection_reason
        AS "Rejection Reason:Link/Casting Treatment Rejection Reason Master:300",

    SUM(ctrrd.quantity)
        AS "Total Rejected Quantity:Float:180"

FROM `tabCasting Treatment Rejected Reasons Details` ctrrd
JOIN `tabCasting Treatment` ct
    ON ctrrd.parent = ct.name

WHERE ct.docstatus = 1

GROUP BY ctrrd.casting_treatment_rejection_reason
ORDER BY SUM(ctrrd.quantity) DESC;
